event_text: m_c was buried alive when an avalanche hit the camp.

history.reg_death: m_c was buried alive in an avalanche.

event_text: m_c snuck out of camp, but found {PRONOUN/m_c/self} lost in the strange, angular tunnels that lead out into the territory. The Clan searches for {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in the morning to no avail. The left-over scent of blood and mountain weasel serving as an intense warning to the other kits.

history:.reg_death: m_c was eaten by a mountain weasel when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} tried to sneak out of camp.
